Lyric:
[by:Dean_Damn]
[00:02.110]Go Chris 
[00:13.750]Goodbye my friend its hard to die 
[00:18.750]when all the birds are singing in the sky 
[00:24.400]And all the flowers are everywhere 
[00:29.790]Pretty girls are everywhere 
[00:34.290]Think of me and I'll be there 
[00:43.690]Goodbye, Papa, please pray for me. 
[00:50.090]I was the black sheep of the family. 
[00:55.190]And I don't know the . all these words. 
[01:00.810]I have boggy turds. 
[01:06.100]With my B.B. gun I would kill birds. 
[01:11.260]We had joy. We had fun. 
[01:15.860]We had seasons in the sun, 
[01:18.610]but the hills that we climb 
[01:21.340]were just seasons out of time. 
[01:27.560]All our lives, we had fun. 
[01:30.420]We had seasons in the sun, 
[01:32.930]but the hill that we reached 
[01:35.300]were just starfish on the beach 
[01:44.110]Goodbye Michelle my little one 
[01:51.960]I was the apple of the shiny sun. 
[01:57.560]And la la la la hill we reach. 
[02:02.560]All my tears are salty. 
[02:07.870]I think now I will start to read. 
[02:14.840]We had joy. We had fun. 
[02:17.860]We had seasons in the sun, 
[02:20.380]but the hills that we climb 
[02:23.040]were just seasons out of time. 
[02:29.570]We had joy. We had fun. 
[02:32.290]We had seasons in the sun, 
[02:34.980]but the hill on the beach 
[02:37.780]were just starfish on the beach 
[02:44.120]We had joy. We had fun. 
[02:46.680]We had seasons in the sun, 
[02:49.250]but the hills that we climb 
[02:51.820]were just seasons out of time. 
[02:58.520]I've had joy. We had fun. 
[03:01.210]We had seasons in the sun, 
[03:03.810]but the stars that we reached 
[03:06.320]were just starfish on the beach
